item.title: Hope - Journal
item.description: This is accompanied with Hope This is to maintain a daily journal of the efforts. This is to be seen from bottom to top. To explain the jargons: cw: current weight gw: goal weight Ok, lets start. March 23, 2021 cw: 74.20 An uneventful day. Since it was a rest day, I went on a short walk as suggested by the Freeletics blog. March 22, 2021 cw: 74.35 I’ve changed the plan in Freeletics.
